lexeme.note: From Scottish Natural Heritage's Faclan Nàdair, as 'grey heron'.
Listed in Dwelly: "Heron, stork, crane — ardea cinerea. [Griathach is from early Irish grith, a scream]."
Listed in Stòr-dàta as 'heron', along with the variant 'gorra chritheach'.
Some variant spellings found in DASG Fieldwork Archive: corra chritheach, corra ria(bha)ch, corra ghriadhach, corra ghriuch, coire ghriothach,
